Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class Leader

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Leader
public class Leader
extends Card
Class Leader defines a class for all card of type leader. It extends Card class adding the effect of type creation.

    • Leader

      public Leader​(int id, int victoryPoints, java.util.ArrayList<Requirement> requirements, java.util.ArrayList<Effect> onActivationEffect, java.util.ArrayList<Effect> onCreationEffects)
      Construct a Leader with specific attributes.
      Parameters:
      victoryPoints - the leader victory points.
      requirements - the leader requirements.
      onCreationEffects - the leader effects of type creation.
      onActivationEffect - the leader effects of type activation.
